interactions.description: Increased bleeding risk. Concurrent use significantly increases hemorrhage risk.
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination. If necessary, monitor INR closely and watch for bleeding signs.

interactions.description: NSAIDs inhibit platelet function and increase anticoagulant effect of Warfarin.
interactions.recommendation: Contraindicated. Use acetaminophen for pain relief instead.

interactions.description: NSAIDs reduce renal clearance of Methotrexate causing toxicity risk.
interactions.recommendation: Avoid combination. Monitor for Methotrexate toxicity if used together.

interactions.description: Furosemide causes potassium loss which increases Digoxin toxicity risk.
interactions.recommendation: Monitor potassium levels and Digoxin levels regularly.

interactions.description: Minor interaction. Lisinopril may slightly enhance glucose-lowering effect.
interactions.recommendation: Monitor blood glucose. Generally safe combination.

interactions.description: Corticosteroids may reduce effectiveness of Methotrexate.
interactions.recommendation: Monitor disease activity and adjust doses as needed.
